channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Charlie Kirk killing deepens America's violent spiral
item.description: The heinous killing of Charlie Kirk shocked the nation's conscience at a moment of searing political tension. In an Oval Office address, President Tru...

item.title: Manhunt ongoing for Charlie Kirk shooting suspect, rifle found near campus
item.description: Authorities identified the firearm they believe was used to shoot and kill conservative activist Charlie Kirk, officials said on Thursday. Driving the...

item.title: Trump immigration crackdown could spur U.S. population decline as soon as 2031
item.description: Data: Congressional Budget Office ; Chart: Axios Visuals The U.S. population will be smaller and grow more slowly than previously projected, a result ...

item.title: U.K. fires ambassador to the U.S. over Epstein revelations
item.description: U.K. Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Thursday fired Peter Mandelson, the British ambassador to the U.S., over his links to convicted sex offender Jeffr...

item.title: Trump to honor Charlie Kirk with posthumous Presidential Medal of Freedom
item.description: MAGA activist and podcaster Charlie Kirk , who was fatally shot Wednesday, will be honored posthumously with the Presidential Medal of Freedom , Presi...

item.title: Vance to visit Charlie Kirk’s family, canceling 9/11 memorial trip
item.description: The vice president and the conservative activist, who was killed Wednesday, had a friendship that went back almost a decade.

item.title: In Trump’s White House, Charlie Kirk’s killing is deeply personal
item.description: The conservative founder of Turning Point USA animated a generation of young activists and was on a first-name basis with most of the West Wing.

item.title: At a Capitol Hill church, mourners gather at a vigil for Charlie Kirk
item.description: More than 150 people gathered to remember the conservative political figure, who was fatally shot during a campus event.

item.title: Tracking who Trump is appointing to fill key administration roles
item.description: Follow President Trump’s progress filling over 800 positions, among about 1,300 that require Senate confirmation, in this tracker from The Washington ...

item.title: America enters a new age of political violence
item.description: Leaders in both parties react to Charlie Kirk’s slaying with fear and foreboding about the country’s direction.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
